long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring order to your marketing data
Our technology unites marketers in large organisations with shared data standards for trustworthy, fast, and impactful insights.

Eliminate the complexity of marketing data operations
Accutics tackles the inefficient and complex marketing data operations enterprises are faced with. Integrating with your existing marketing technology, Accutics provides the standards and processes to connect data across teams and platforms. With a complete and unified dataset, each team has the insights they need to drive business performance.

Define your data foundation across all marketing activities
Your taxonomies and naming conventions are the essential ingredients in your single source of truth. Accutics Standardize governs your defined standards and makes them available to marketers - whether internal or external.

Introducing the Accutics browser extension
As we continue to strive for data excellence and the best possible workflow for our users, we are releasing our browser extension. This will allow you to create standardized naming and tracking URLs based on set conventions for your business without leaving the current media platform context. 

Accutics - Data Standards wherever you are!

Note: The use of this extension requires an account with Accutics.
